title: Creative Coding Lab
description: Build playful mini-apps with JavaScript fundamentals and design-first thinking.

title: Storytelling Champs
description: Craft short stories and zines while exploring tone, pacing, and illustration.

title: Mini Makers Lab
description: Hands-on building sessions using cardboard engineering and simple circuits.

title: Kitchen Chemistry
description: Tasty science demos that explain reactions using everyday ingredients.

title: Movement Mix
description: Blend yoga, hip-hop, and stretching sequences for balance and expression.

title: Art Sprint Studio
description: Rapid-fire prompts challenge students to sketch bold concepts in minutes.

title: Robot Rally
description: Team up to prototype bots that navigate colorful obstacle courses.

title: Garden Chefs
description: Grow herbs, harvest greens, and cook vibrant snacks from the garden.
